body.name: Cooling Pillows Queen Size Set of 2,Shredded Memory Foam Bed Pillows for Sleeping,Queen Pillows for Back & Side Sleepers,Adjustable 2 Pillows Queen Size with Washable Cover
features: Hot sleepers' gospel: Bed pillows has a double-sided design with cooling fiber on one side and the other is 60% polyester+40% rayon made from bamboo). lining is a lightweight 100 GSM polyester fabric, allowing free air circulation. Fill with evenly cut memory foam, which effectively reduces heat build-up. Cooling pillows for sleeping provides a more comfortable sleeping experience for hot sleepers and works better in air-conditioned rooms.

Fuller Design：The 2-inch gusseted edges increase the internal height of the pillow, requiring more filling than a normal pillow to achieve the ideal fullness, ideal for side sleepers and for use as support.Queen pillows 2 pack filled with high-quality slow rebound shredded memory foam mixed with microfiber, accurate ratios to achieve the perfect balance between support and softness after several experiments .

Brand Quality Pillows: Meoflaw has been deepening the pillows since 2018, its microfiber sleeping pillows harvest 100,000 + customers. These queen size pillows are upgraded from the regular shredded memory foam pillows to be fuller and firmer.Pillowcase adopts 3D-design,fashion,simple and beautiful. Double zipper design to achieve adjustable function, by adding or reducing the filling to find the height that fits you.

Sealed Packaging:Vacuum compression packaging to reduce transport costs, quality shredded memory foam springs back to its original size in 3-5 minutes (slightly slower in cold temperatures).Sealing process to avoid moisture problems in the storage process.

Simple Options:Bed pillows & positioners are designed for easy maintenance, the pillowcase can be machine washed after disassembly, filling can be easily obtained by patting the fluffiness, which is the choice for long-term use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The original pillow is well filled, full and firm, try removing some of the filling to make the pillow softer! Easy Home Care: How to Prep： Remove Pillow from plastic wrap,let pillow fully aired-out and expand.Fluff the pillows by hand or direct under the sunlight.Enjoy the moment. How to Clean: Pillowcase-Regular Machine Wash( below 30 degrees）Filler-Do not Wash(Sunlight exposure） Note: Memory and air contact may appear yellowing, belongs to the normal phenomenon, does not prevent use.Shredded memory foam has a slight foam odors,but does not contain harmful chemicals.Please remove and clean the outer pillowcase, then let the filler air out for 12-24 hours to dissipate odors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are fantastic. Very comfortable and are exceptional for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why so big? Are these for giants? No…They’re customizable!
reviews.reviewText: I usually like to buy pillows in person but grabbed these in a pinch because of the price. When I got them I was confused because they were ginormous and heavy! I thought….”Who are these for? Andre the gaint?”They might be great as bolster support pillows for sitting up in bed but you certainly couldn’t put your head on them so sleep as is. Honestly, I couldn’t even get a king pillow case on them they were so thick. I bought them as body/leg support pillows but couldn’t even wrap my leg across they were so thick!THEN I read the reviews. They’re customizable! Just take out as much filling as you need to make it the thickness you desire. The filling is nice and pliable.Once customized to my desired thickness they were great! Photos are AFTER I took out at hat bag full of filling.I took over half the filling out to get them where I needed them. I’m going to use use the trash bag fill of filling to restuff some older throw follows gone flat.For the price they’re great. I can’t vouch for “cooling” effect as I don’t have problems with that. But overall I love that they’re customizable, soft, and supportive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Big, buy not really memory foam feel.
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are large and feel good. They are however very firm. Even after breaking it in, there really is not much give. Not able to really get your head into the pillow. Buy overall it's nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm pillows, perfect
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these pills because I'm a side sleeper. The soft pillows just don't support my head and neck correctly. This supports my head in a neutral position perfectly. And I use another for my arm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really love my new pillows!
reviews.reviewText: Pillows came vacuum, packed in a deceivingly small package. When they were brought out of the packaging, they fluffed up incredibly! I ended up taking 25% of the filling out of each pillow. Now they are absolutely awesome! And when they are used after many years I can add more of the filling back in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These are nice pillows, but very thick and heavy. I know you can take some of the stuffing out , but I am afraid it might get lumpy and uncomfortable then. If you are a stomach sleeper you will definitely need to remove some of the filling. They are well made, definitely work it if you like a firmer, thick pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these pillows. Once I cut the package open, they fluffed up so fat and full. My pillowcase are nice and full. No more flat pillows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ideal for me
reviews.reviewText: I'm a side sleeper who likes to cradle their head in a supportive pillow. This adjustable shredded memory foam pillow is exactly what I was looking for. It is soft but doesn't flatten. Not heavy like a solid memory foam. The cooling foam actually works!
